UnifiedVoiceCall.name: UnifiedVoiceCall
UnifiedVoiceCall.description: Represents a voice call that is captured or synced from a VoiceCall or Task record.

ActivityDateTime.description: The date and time of the activity in the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time zone.

ActivitySubType.description: Provides standard subtypes to facilitate creating and searching for specific activity subtypes.

CallDurationInSeconds.description: The duration of the voice call in seconds.

DetailId.description: The ID of the object that contains detailed activity-specific information. The object depends on the activity type. For example, the detail for a Task activity is a Task object. The detail for an Event activity is an Event object.

IsInsightAvailable.description: Indicates whether the activity has an insight associated with it (true) or not (false).

Snippet.description: An abbreviation of the voice call content. This field has a maximum length of 255 characters.

Subject.description: Contains the subject of the voice call.
